title: Philipsen vs. Milan vs. Merlier: Sprinting’s Royalty Converges in UAE for 2025’s First High-Speed Battle
content:
Jasper Philipsen, Tim Merlier, Jonathan Milan just three of many big names poised to test legs at the UAE Tour.

Read the full article at Philipsen vs. Milan vs. Merlier: Sprinting’s Royalty Converges in UAE for 2025’s First High-Speed Battle on Velo.
author: sstokes
